title: Tech’s hottest new job: AI whisperer. No coding required.
description: Proponents of the growing field argue that the early weirdness of AI chatbots can be avoided by a human giving the machine all the right instructions.

title: Impact of Ukraine-Russia war: Cybersecurity has improved for all
description: Russia’s cyberattacks may have helped inoculate Ukraine against more devastating attacks, experts say, and that is resonating in Europe and the United States.
